title: Caitlyn and Illaoi Word Clouds
body:
I thought the Word Clouds were cool, so I decided to go to /r/Caitlynmains and /r/Illaoi and asked them to take a survey. After several days I made word clouds with these answers. The Caitlyn survey got about 37 and Illaoi got about 75. Enjoy!

{{champion:51}} https://imgur.com/a/Vz4xK
{{champion:420}} https://imgur.com/a/wPOms

replies.body: Why do so many people spell "Tentacles" wrong?

> [{quoted}](name=Quepha,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AvEfiEzJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-24T08:11:27.575+0000)
>
> Why do so many people spell "Tentacles" wrong?

I blame Pokemon: Tentacool and Tentacruel

> [{quoted}](name=Hexs Fortune,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AvEfiEzJ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-11-24T18:28:22.882+0000)
>
> I blame Pokemon: Tentacool and Tentacruel

I admire the brave souls who gave trying to spell Nagakabouros a try.

Hey Bubbaman73 - neat stuff, and word clouds are fun :)  
Did you consider consolidating the misspellings of the various words to get a clearer read?

No, I thought the major misspells gave the clouds a comedic effect, and gave a bit more insight to how silly the community is, so I kept them, and I could tell when someone misspelled on purpose.

And thank you, I hope the community can see a clearer picture of Illaoi/Caitlyn from these!

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AvEfiEzJ,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-11-24T19:34:11.136+0000)
>
> I admire the brave souls who gave trying to spell Nagakabouros a try.
> 
> Hey Bubbaman73 - neat stuff, and word clouds are fun :)  
> Did you consider consolidating the misspellings of the various words to get a clearer read?

* Naga -like a snake
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NƒÅga

* Ka - like the Ka of Ancient Egypt
https://www.britannica.com/topic/ka-Egyptian-religion

* Bouros - like Orobouros, a serpent symbol eating its own tail
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ouroboros
Lmao I know who did that

I like it how {{champion:51}} mains can still appreciate her range autos, but still get wrecked by being our ranged. Or that our beloved sniper gets out sniped ({{champion:202}} {{champion:101}} or any of the skill shot globes {{champion:22}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:81}} ) That said, it kind of feels like she loses out in her own niche, and honestly her traps stand out more when thinking about it. The only saving grace would be her passive. All in all thou, the most surprising discovery, is there are Illlaoi mains.

Wow these are really cool, would like to see one for /r/Vladmains
{{sticker:vlad-salute}}

These are actually really cool!

I would love to see more of these. How do you make them?

Thank you!

I used google forms to make a survey of some questions and sent them out to the Champion Mains reddits. After a few days I take the results, put it in a word cloud generator, making some changes and putting together similar ones, and make them.
